node.html: A library that helps a user to register endpoints and spin up lightweight queues to queue http requests to those endpoints in order to achieve strict pessimistic concurrency control at the network request level.
A simple web app to help my girlfriend - a design student - create mind-maps for her product design homework.
A collection of shell scripts for quick production deployment of web apps.
REST API (with token authentication) powering a concept app for club/department recruitments at BITS Pilani. Written on node.js with express.
The official website of ACM's BITS Pilani student chapter, controlled by an older version of the universal CMS mentioned above (see BITS-website in featured projects)
A small-scale anonymous chat-room app, written in JavaScript, powered by Socket.io. Does not require a traditional database (like MySQL or MongoDB) to work. Users can host their own chat servers.
A web-based game where users get virtual money and can trade stocks. Stock prices change approximately according to the rules of the Stock Market.
Idea submission for a blockchain based voting system for CodeFunDo++ 2019.
A little weather app that I built while I was learning back-end development with node.js
